snippet.title: Mandragora - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
➳ Play the Mandragora Demo now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2423720/Mandragora_Demo/ 

Mandragora is a story-driven, side-scroller action RPG set in a universe of gorgeous paint strokes and inevitable tragedy.
➳ Add to Steam Wishlist: https://bit.ly/3Dvf6Er

Slash, burn, and rage against the creatures beyond the town walls. Light your Witch Lantern, navigate through the dark plane of Entropy, and tear reality asunder.

Coming to PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch.
Release date TBA.
Developed by Primal Game Studio and published by Marvelous Europe.

‣ Website: https://mandragoragame.com/
‣ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/54RCzxY
‣ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MandragoraGame
‣ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/MandragoraGame/
‣ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MandragoraGame/
